string.text: Great Swamp Clean-up
Cold wants to root out Clear Sky's enemies from the Great Swamp. Collect patches.

At first we were almost grateful that the military barged in on our bandit clean-up. Sadly, later they set up a few permanent outposts to the north. Their patrols aren't exactly friendly to our guys either, not to mention they did a shoddy job and there's a constant trickle of bandits harassing our outposts. Show them what we're made of.
Here you are, our professional hitman. I suppose those bastards will think twice before they dare visit our Swamp again. I hope. Here's your reward, by the way.
Night Terror
Cold wants to eliminate a dangerous mutant which roams not far away from the Hidden Base.

Mutants rarely stray close to our base. But our guys reported that the previous night some giant beast tore apart the whole team that manned the lookout tower to the north west. Four well-armed people just smeared all over the perimeter. Those weren't dogs for sure. I know you're a tough guy, so maybe you could visit the place and get rid of that nasty fucker?
Hey, great job, man! I hope this reward's good enough for you. That and the stories people'll tell.
Defend the pump station

One of our patrols captured some bandits fucking around the pump station, after a good beating they confessed they're preparing an assault. We don't know when they'll hit, I already sent some guys over there but any help is welcome... and rewarded of course.
Unnatural Selection
Collect mutant parts samples for Professor Kalancha.

Mutants of the Zone have displayed numerous peculiar adaptations to its anomalous conditions. Please, collect some tissue samples for my research. They might help us persevere in this environment as well.

Mutants of the Zone have displayed numerous peculiar adaptations to its anomalous conditions. Please, collect some tissue samples for my research. They might help us persevere in this environment as well. Collect mutant parts samples.
The samples are in good condition. Very well, I will get to research immediately. Thank you.
Scientific Progress
Find one artefact for Professor Kalancha.
Artefacts may provide invaluable data for our research. However, with the many threats we face our men cannot really afford to collect them for me all that often. Could you help me?

Artefacts may provide invaluable data for our research. However, with the many threats we face our men cannot really afford to collect them for me all that often. Could you help me? Find one artefact.
Even after all these years they never cease to amaze me. What a wonderful specimen. Thank you for your assistance.
Scarce Supplies
Professor Kalancha requires a medical supplies

You see, Spore does his best to provide supplies for us. But even after all these years we are still in a difficult situation. There is no shortage of injuries to treat but our medical supplies are limited. Please, help me supplement our stock.

You see, Spore does his best to provide supplies for us. But even after all these years we are still in a difficult situation. There is no shortage of injuries to treat but our medical supplies are limited. Please, help me supplement our stock. Procure some medical supplies, please.
We are all deeply indebted for your help.
Find medical supplies for Professor Kalancha
%s is required by Professor Kalancha to work on medical supplies. You should bring them back to him if you find any.

Maintaining what's left from medical supplies storage with this number of injuries I have to treat on daily basis is worrying. I'm gonna run out of bandages and medkits soon or later. I need you to find me one of those old drug-making kits. They will come in handy for sure.
Great job! I own you big time.
Deliver PDA to Nimble
Spore needs you to deliver an encrypted PDA to Nimble in Zaton.

Okay, hotshot. Need a job? This PDA needs delivered to a dude who hangs out in Zaton; his name is Nimble. He will compensate you on delivery. Don't drop it in a puddle or some dumb shit like that... or I'll have your ass. While you're there, check out what he has to offer; he can get his hands on some nice equipment... for a price.
Destroy the helicopter
Spore is fed up and wants you to destroy the helicopter. He will offer you a discount if you follow through.

That damn chopper is driving me nuts. I have bad tinnitus, and every time that fucking thing is patrolling the southern border, it makes my ears scream! Makes me want to bludgeon a baby flesh! Down the fucking thing and I'll give you a discount, please, before I get somebody killed.
Escort the Ecologists
Clear Sky scientists have hired you to guide them to a specific location for study. Once their research has been successfully conducted, return them safely to camp; where you will be compensated.

Scientists here in camp need an experienced stalker to lead them out into the field for study. Are you up for it? Your job is to keep them alive and guide them to their destination. Failure will give you a bad reputation around here.
Thank you, stalker. You may have this as payment for your services.
Clear area of mutants

Mutants have been spotted near this location making the area dangerous for some of the locals. You have been tasked to eliminate the mutant threat within the area. Report back to Librarian after the job is done.
Are you an avid hunter? We've been looking for someone to keep the marshes a bit safer by clearing out mutants in areas that our faction frequents. Would you like the job?
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to pass the word around that it's safe there once again. Thank you, stalker.
Assault the bandit camp
You have been tasked to eliminate the bandit threat within the area. Report back to Librarian after the job is done.

We have a big problem with bandits in the area. Those murderous thugs have been ambushing our camps outside the main base, trying to take the territory over. It'll deny us passage through many safe routes through the marshes as long as they're in the area. We need an experienced stalker who is not afraid to get his hands dirty. Will you help us out?
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to pass the word around that it's safe there once again. Thank you, stalker.
Procure mutant parts
Field dress freshly dead mutants to collect game meat. Then deliver some mutant meat to Librarian in the Clear Sky base camp.
If you are good with a rifle and not afraid of a few mutants, then I have a job for you. Are you interested?

Rations are running low, and I need to keep everyone in camp's bellies full. Some of the guys bring me back a kill or two every now and again. But it's been slow lately... So if you aren't too busy and you are out and about, I need meat. I kill and process the meat, right here in my kitchen. Keep in mind that getting the mutants all riled up makes the meat tough because of the adrenaline. Also, the lesser the bleeding, the better the meat tastes. So, just be careful with your shots, okay?
Great, you are a good hunter after all! I have payment for you.
You are our guide? I will mark the location on your PDA. Lead the way, and we will follow. After we complete our analysis escort us back safely. Speak to me again when we return to camp.
Yes? We should get moving. The longer we wait around, the more dangerous it gets.
Thank you, stalker. You did your job well. Here is your payment.
Okay.
